actions_taken.purpose: Understand current import structure and identify duplicate imports

actions_taken.description: Merged two separate import statements from '../../services' into a single statement
actions_taken.new_import: import { testBackendConnection, ApiError, type ApiTestResponse } from '../../services';
actions_taken.technique: Used TypeScript inline type import syntax (type keyword before ApiTestResponse)

actions_taken.description: ESLint passed without any errors, confirming no-duplicate-imports rule is satisfied

technical_notes: TypeScript supports inline type imports using 'type' keyword before specific imports
This approach keeps type imports explicit while satisfying the no-duplicate-imports rule
All functionality preserved: testBackendConnection (runtime), ApiError (runtime class), ApiTestResponse (type)
